meanings.definition: The quality or state of being visible.
meanings.sent1: The visibleness of the stars in the night sky was breathtaking.
meanings.sent2: The visibleness of the road signs helped us navigate through the fog.
meanings.sent3: The magician's cloak had a special visibleness that made it seem to disappear.
meanings.sent4: Her smile had a visibleness that lit up the entire room.
meanings.sent5: The visibleness of the rainbow after the rain was a beautiful sight.

meanings.definition: The extent to which something can be seen or perceived.
meanings.sent1: The visibleness of the mountain peak was obscured by thick clouds.
meanings.sent2: The visibleness of the tiny insect on the leaf surprised the hiker.
meanings.sent3: The visibleness of the cat sneaking up on the mouse was comical.
meanings.sent4: The visibleness of the truth became clear as the investigation progressed.
meanings.sent5: The visibleness of the full moon in the night sky was mesmerizing.
